metadata.title: CVE-2024-9399 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A website configured to initiate a specially crafted WebTransport sessioncould crash the Firefox process leading to a denial of service condition.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 131, Firefox ESR < 128.3, Thunderbird< 128.3, and Thunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
